TypeSignature.Value: public class Tuple<T1,T2,T3,T4,T5,T6,T7,TRest> : IComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable

.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Tuple`8<T1, T2, T3, T4, T5, T6, T7, TRest> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable
Public Class Tuple(Of T1, T2, T3, T4, T5, T6, T7, TRest) Implements IComparable, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable

generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5, typename T6, typename T7, typename TRest> public ref class Tuple : IComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable

summary.span: 表示 n 元组，n 为 8 或更大值。

span.span: Represents an *n*-tuple, where *n* is 8 or greater.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元组是具有特定的数量和值序列的数据结构。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 类表示*n*元组具有八个或多个组件。The class represents an *n*-tuple that has eight or more components. 可以实例化对象与通过调用静态完全八个组件方法。You can instantiate a object with exactly eight components by calling the static method. 下面的示例创建一个 8 元组 （八元组） 包含小于 20 的质数。The following example creates an 8-tuple (octuple) that contains prime numbers that are less than 20. 请注意它使用类型推断功能来确定每个组件的类型。Note that it uses type inference to determine the type of each component. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/createntuple.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/createntuple.vb#17)] 你可以还通过实例化具有八个或多个组件的 n 元组对象调用构造函数。You can also instantiate an n-tuple object with eight or more components by calling the constructor. 下面的示例使用构造函数来创建的 8 元组，它等效于在前面的示例中创建元组。The following example uses the constructor to create an 8-tuple that is equivalent to the tuple created in the previous example. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.class/cs/octuple1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.class/vb/octuple1.vb#1)] > [!NOTE] > 若要创建具有九个或多个组件的 n 元组，必须调用构造函数。To create an n-tuple with nine or more components, you must call the constructor. 静态工厂方法的类不支持创建`Tuple`包含多个八个组件的对象。The static factory methods of the class do not support the creation of `Tuple` objects with more than eight components. 若要实例化 n 元组具有八个或多个组件构造函数，提供一个泛型`Tuple`对象作为`rest`参数定义的第八个通过*n*th 组件的元组。To instantiate an n-tuple that has eight or more components with the constructor, you supply a generic `Tuple` object as the `rest` parameter to define the eighth through *n*th components of the tuple. 通过嵌套泛型`Tuple`中这样一来，你可以创建其组件数有没有实际限制的元组的对象。By nesting generic `Tuple` objects in this way, you can create a tuple that has no practical limitation on the number of its components. 下面的示例创建一个 17 元组包含填充数据的密歇根州底特律每个国家/地区人口普查从 1860年到 2000年。The following example creates a 17-tuple that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, for each national census from 1860 to 2000. 此元组的第一个组件是市/县名。The first component of the tuple is the city name. 第二个部分是数据序列的开始日期和第三个组件是开始日期的人口。The second component is the start date of the data series, and the third component is the population at the start date. 每个后续组件提供十年间隔的人口。Each subsequent component provides the population at decade intervals. 17 元组创建的嵌套对象内对象。The 17-tuple is created by nesting a object inside a object. (这就是，则对象提供的值作为`rest`中的参数类构造函数。)这对象，反过来，嵌套在为外部对象。(That is, the object is supplied as the value of the `rest` parameter in the class constructor.) This object is, in turn, nested in an outer object. (这就是，则对象提供的值作为`rest`中外部参数对象的类构造函数。)(That is, the object is supplied as the value of the `rest` parameter in the outer object's class constructor.) [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/example.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/example.vb#19)] 你可以通过使用只读的检索此元组的前七个组件的值， ， ， ， ， ，和实例属性。You can retrieve the value of the tuple's first seven components by using the read-only , , , , , , and instance properties. 任何其他组件嵌套的并且可以从检索属性。Any additional components are nested and can be retrieved from the property. 在前面的示例中，通过属性检索此元组的第七个组件之间的第一个。In the previous example, the through properties retrieve the first through seventh components of the tuple. 通过第 14 个组件的第八个包含嵌套在第二个级别，该元组中，由表示`Rest.Item1`通过`Rest.Item7`属性。The eighth through fourteenth components are contained in the tuple that is nested at the second level, and are represented by the `Rest.Item1` through `Rest.Item7` properties. 第十五个到十七个组件包含在嵌套第三个级别的元组，并且由表示`Rest.Rest.Item1`尽管`Rest.Rest.Item3`属性。The fifteenth through seventeenth components are contained in the tuple that is nested at the third level, and are represented by the `Rest.Rest.Item1` though `Rest.Rest.Item3` properties. 元组常用四个不同的方式：Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 来表示一组数据。To represent a single set of data. 例如，一个元组可以表示的数据库记录，并且其组件可以表示每个字段的记录。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 若要提供轻松访问和数据集的操作。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. - 若要通过无需使用方法返回多个值`out`参数 （在 C# 中) 或`ByRef`参数 （在 Visual Basic 中)。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 例如，前面的示例返回城市名称，其计算统计信息中对象。For example, the previous example returns its computed statistics, along with the city name, in a object. - 若要将多个值传递给通过单个参数的方法。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如，方法只有一个参数，你可以提供一个值，则在启动线程执行的方法。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果你提供对象作为方法自变量，则可以提供具有七项数据的线程的启动例程。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread’s startup routine with seven items of data.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你还可以使用静态方法实例化的 8 元组 （八元组） 对象，而无需显式指定其组件的类型。You can also use the static method to instantiate an 8-tuple (octuple) object without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. 下面的示例使用方法可实例化一个包含小于 20 的质数的 8 元组对象。The following example uses the method to instantiate an 8-tuple object that contains prime numbers that are less than 20. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/createntuple.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/createntuple.vb#17)] 这相当于对的以下调用类构造函数。This is equivalent to the following call to the class constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.class/cs/octuple1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.class/vb/octuple1.vb#1)] 但是，静态方法无法用于创建具有多个八个组件的元组对象。However, the static method cannot be used to create a tuple object with more than eight components. 使用时构造函数创建 n 元组具有八个或多个组件，你使用`rest`参数来创建嵌套的 n 元组具有介于 1 到七个组件。When using the constructor to create an n-tuple with eight or more components, you use the `rest` parameter to create a nested n-tuple that has from one to seven components. 通过使用连续的嵌套层，你可以创建 n 元组具有几乎无限的数量的组件。By using successive levels of nesting, you can create an n-tuple that has a virtually unlimited number of components. 例如，若要创建 25 元组，您实例化三个级别的嵌套对象，如下所示：For example, to create a 25-tuple, you instantiate a object with three levels of nesting, as follows: - 最外面对象包含通过第七个组件的第一个。The outermost object contains the first through seventh components. 其属性提供访问权限在第一个级别的嵌套的对象。Its property provides access to an object at the first level of nesting. - 最外面嵌套对象包含的第八个到第 14 个组件，并将其属性提供访问权限在第二个级别的嵌套的对象。The outermost nested object contains the eighth through fourteenth components, and its property provides access to an object at the second level of nesting. - 在第二个级别的嵌套的对象包含的第十五个到第二十一个组件，并将其属性提供访问权限在第三个级别的嵌套的对象。The object at the second level of nesting contains the fifteenth through twenty-first components, and its property provides access to an object at the third level of nesting. - 最内部的元组是包含二十一秒通过二十五个组件的对象。The innermost tuple is a object that contains the twenty-second through twenty-fifth components. ## Examples 下面的示例创建包含的密歇根州底特律从 1860年 2000年到每个人口普查人口数据 17-元组。The following example creates a 17-tuple that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, for each census from 1860 to 2000. 此元组的第一个组件是市/县名。The first component of the tuple is the city name. 第二个部分是数据，序列的开始日期和第三个组件是开始日期的人口。The second component is the start date of the series of data, and the third component is the population at the start date. 每个后续组件提供十年间隔的人口。Each subsequent component provides the population at decade intervals. 该示例使用嵌套的两个图层来创建 17 元组： 它定义的 7 元组的第三到第七个组件包含填充数据 1860 到 1900 年，嵌套 7 元组 1910 到 1970 年，包含填充数据和内部嵌套 3 元组包含从 1980 到 2000年填充数据。The example uses two layers of nesting to create the 17-tuple: It defines a 7-tuple whose third through seventh components contain population data for 1860 through 1900, a nested 7-tuple that contains population data for 1910 through 1970, and an inner nested 3-tuple that contains population data for 1980 through 2000. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/example.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/example.vb#19)]

span.span: is not a generic object.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Equals (object obj);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean
public: override bool Equals(System::Object ^ obj);

param.name: obj
param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前的 对象是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`参数被视为可与当前实例相等，如果它满足以下所有条件：The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance if it meets all the following conditions: - 它是对象。It is a object. - 它具有相同的类型与当前实例相同的组件的总数。It has the same total number of components that are of the same types as the current instance. - 其组件 （包括其嵌套的组件） 是等于当前实例。Its components (including its nested components) are equal to those of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下面的示例定义五个包含质数的对象。The following example defines five objects that contain prime numbers. 它然后将与每个剩余的对象的第一个对象进行比较。It then compares the first object with each of the remaining objects. 如输出所示，只有第一个和最后一个对象相等，因为它们具有相同数目的具有相同的值的组件。As the output shows, only the first and the last objects are equal, because they have an identical number of components with identical values. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the current object's first component.

value.span: 当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's first component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以动态确定的一种组件在两种方式之一：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过调用`GetType`方法返回的值属性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索对象，表示对象，并返回对数组中检索的第一个元素其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个包含密歇根州底特律从 1860 年到 2000年的填充数据的 17 元组对象。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17 元组的第一个组件是市/县名。The first component of the 17-tuple is the city name. 该示例使用属性来显示填充数据之前表标题中显示的城市名称。The example uses the property to display the city name in the table header before displaying the population data. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

span.span: The value of the current object's second component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以动态确定的一种组件在两种方式之一：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过调用`GetType`方法返回的值属性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索对象，表示对象，并返回对数组中检索第二个元素其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the second element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个包含密歇根州底特律从 1860 年到 2000年的填充数据的 17 元组对象。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17 元组的第二个组件是数据序列的第一年。The second component of the 17-tuple is the first year of the data series. 该示例将指定的值到一个变量，然后使用该变量表示的年份显示其数据的属性。The example assigns the value of the property to a variable, and then uses that variable to represent the year whose data is displayed. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以动态确定的一种组件在两种方式之一：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过调用`GetType`方法返回的值属性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索对象，表示对象，并返回对数组中检索的第三个元素其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the third element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个包含密歇根州底特律从 1860 年到 2000年的填充数据的 17 元组对象。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17 元组的第三个组件是正在 1860年填充。The third component of the 17-tuple is the population in 1860. 该示例使用属性以显示人口值并计算的年度 1860年和 1870年之间的填充变动率。The example uses the property to display the population value and to calculate the annual rate of population change between 1860 and 1870. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以动态确定的一种组件在两种方式之一：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过调用`GetType`方法返回的值属性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索对象，表示对象，并返回对数组中检索的第五个元素其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the fifth element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个包含密歇根州底特律从 1860 年到 2000年的填充数据的 17 元组对象。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17 元组的第五个组件是正在 1880年填充。The fifth component of the 17-tuple is the population in 1880. 该示例使用属性以显示人口值并计算的年度 1880年和 1890年之间的填充变动率。The example uses the property to display the population value and to calculate the annual rate of population change between 1880 and 1890. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的剩余分量。

span.span: Gets the current object's remaining components.

value.span: 当前 对象的剩余分量的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's remaining components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回嵌套`Tuple`对象，但允许访问的第八*n*th 组件的元组。The property returns a nested `Tuple` object that allows access to the eighth though *n*th components of the tuple. 可以根据元组中的组件的总数量，检索到十四个组件的第八个的值从嵌套`Tuple`对象的通过属性。Depending on the total number of components in the tuple, the values of the eighth through fourteenth components can be retrieved from the nested `Tuple` object's through properties. 然后，可以使用的嵌套属性对象以检索`Tuple`在下一步的嵌套级别的对象。You can then use the property of a nested object to retrieve the `Tuple` object at the next level of nesting. 你可以动态确定中嵌套的组件数量`Tuple`返回的对象通过提取数字从其类型名称的属性。You can dynamically determine the number of components in a nested `Tuple` object that is returned by the property by extracting the digit from its type name. 下面的示例进行了这方面的演示。The following example provides an illustration. [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/rest.vb#2)] ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个包含密歇根州底特律从 1860 年到 2000年的填充数据的 17 元组对象。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17-元组的第七个分量是 1900 年的人口。The seventh component of the 17-tuple is the population in 1900. 该示例使用检索通过第 14 个组件和它的第八个值的属性使用的嵌套属性对象以检索剩余的组件的值。The example uses the property to retrieve the values of the eighth through fourteenth components, and it uses the property of the nested object to retrieve the values of the remaining components. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

param.name: other
param.span: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供用于比较的自定义规则的对象。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比较器将当前的 对象与指定对象进行比较，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前对象在排序顺序中的位置是在指定对象之前、之后还是与其相同。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示此实例和 在排序顺序中的相对位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.

span.description: 此实例在排序顺序中的位置与 相同。
This instance and have the same position in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口应用。This member is an explicit interface implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法可让你定义的自定义的比较对象。This method lets you define customized comparisons of objects. 例如，可以使用此方法为顺序对象基于特定组件的值。For example, you can use this method to order objects based on the value of a specific component. 虽然可以直接调用此方法，它通常由集合排序方法包括参数集合的成员进行排序。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection-sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如，它由方法和方法通过实例化的对象构造函数。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 不是时应使用的比较的主要用途是确定两个对象是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的数组包含四个美国城市从 1940年到 2000年的填充数据的对象。The following example creates an array of objects that contains population data for four U.S. cities from 1940 to 2000. 八元组的第一个组件是市/县名。The octuple's first component is the city name. 剩余的六个组件表示 1940年到 2000年 10 年间隔的人口。The remaining six components represent the population at 10-year intervals from 1940 to 2000. `PopulationComparer`类提供实现，它允许对八元及其组件的任何一个按排序数组。The `PopulationComparer` class provides an implementation that allows the array of octuples to be sorted by any one of its components. 两个值提供给`PopulationComparer`其构造函数中的类： 定义排序顺序中，该组件的位置和一个值，该值指示是否应按升序或降序排序元组对象。Two values are provided to the `PopulationComparer` class in its constructor: The position of the component that defines the sort order, and a value that indicates whether the tuple objects should be sorted in ascending or descending order. 该示例然后显示未排序顺序中的数组中的元素，按第三个组件 （1950 年的人口） 进行排序和显示，然后按第八个组件 （2000 年的人口） 进行排序并显示它们。The example then displays the elements in the array in unsorted order, sorts them by the third component (the population in 1950) and displays them, and then sorts them by the eighth component (the population in 2000) and displays them. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

param.name: other
param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 仅当调用实现`other`不`null`，和可以成功地强制转换 （在 C# 中) 或 （在 Visual Basic 中) 转换为具有相同的总数量的组件的对象 （包括那些在嵌套`Tuple`对象) 的类型与当前实例相同。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object that has the same total number of components (including those in nested `Tuple` objects) of the same types as the current instance. 方法第一个传递值对象要进行比较实现。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果此方法调用返回`true`，再次调用该方法并将其传递这两个值对象。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 此过程将继续，直到方法调用返回`false`进行比较的值或两个特定的对值传递给方法。This continues until the method call returns `false` when it compares a specific pair of values, or the two values are passed to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 方法只是包装调用`comparer`对象的实现。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用于计算哈希代码的算法应返回相同的哈希代码的两个被认为是相等的对象。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法提供实现类。This method provides the implementation for the class. 虽然可以直接调用该方法，它通常由集合排序的默认重载方法，如和、 集合的成员进行排序。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection-sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 不是时应使用的比较的主要用途是确定两个对象是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 此方法使用的默认对象比较器比较每个组件。This method uses the default object comparer to compare each component. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个其组件都是整数，包含质数某一范围的八元数组。The following example creates an array of octuples whose components are integers that contain a range of prime numbers. 该示例显示未排序顺序中的数组的元素、 排序数组，，然后按排序顺序显示数组。The example displays the elements of the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then displays the array in sorted order. 该输出显示，已按排序数组，或元组的第一个组件。The output shows that the array has been sorted by , or the tuple's first component. 请注意，该示例不直接调用方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 隐式调用此方法数组中每个元素的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此方法返回的字符串的形式 (*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*， `Item5, Item6, Item7`， *Item8*...)，其中*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*， *Item5*， *Item6*，和*Item7*表示的值， ， ， ， ， ，和属性。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, `Item5, Item6, Item7`, *Item8*…), where *Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, *Item5*, *Item6*, and *Item7* represent the values of the , , , , , , and properties. *Item8*表示的值对象的`Next.Item1`属性。*Item8* represents the value of the object's `Next.Item1` property. 任何其他的嵌套组件的值遵循*Item8*。The value of any additional nested components follow *Item8*. 如果任何属性值为`null`，它会表示为。If any of the property values is `null`, it is represented as . ## Examples 下面的示例创建包含的数据填充的密歇根州底特律从 1900年到 1860年 17-元组。The following example creates a 17-tuple that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 1900. 然后，它使用方法以显示此元组的数据。It then uses the method to display the tuple's data. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.tostring/cs/tostring1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.tostring/vb/tostring1.vb#1)]
